mapper.select: SELECT pictureId,pictureTitle,pictureName,userName,pictures.createTime createTime,clickCount FROM pictures LEFT JOIN user ON (pictures.userId=user.userId) RIGHT JOIN pictureType ON pictures.pictureType=pictureType.typeId WHERE userName LIKE #{key} OR pictureTitle LIKE #{key} AND pictures.isLock ="N" ORDER BY ${orderType} ${orderValue} LIMIT #{start},#{pageSize}
